title: Implement the Broadcast Channel API
body: BroadcastChannel offers a way for all scripts, regardless of window/frame/tab/worker context, to communicate with each other via messaging, similar to MessageChannel.

comments.body: Come on! I know that the new EDGE is using Chromium, but many users still use old EDGE.
This is now more than 3 years old. I do not understand how Product Management wants to position Edge in the market when it does not support such features.

In the meantime, you could try a polyfill:
https://medium.com/@alex89x/communication-among-iframes-and-tabs-a-working-polyfill-for-broadcast-channel-api-f44d07dcf527
We want to share data amongst tabs and need this or SharedWorker to correctly implement this.
